thothbot.parallax.core.shared.cameras

Class OrthographicCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.objects.Object3D
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.cameras.Camera
        • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.cameras.OrthographicCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.event.shared.EventHandler, HasEventBus, ViewportResizeHandler, DimensionalObject

    public class OrthographicCamera
extends Camera
    Camera with orthographic projection 
     OrthographicCamera camera = new OrthographicCamera( width / - 2, width / 2, height / 2, height / - 2, 1, 1000 ); 
 
 // or, simple
 
 OrthographicCamera camera = new OrthographicCamera( width, height, 1, 1000 );
    Author:
    thothbot
